10_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body:
> [ripper234](#comment_15_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL): I registered an email address and everything works. Kudos!
> Now, how do I register another email address?

You can if you are able to modify your user.json file by hand.

This is my cert:

"certs": {
      "zeroid.bit": {
        "auth_address": "...", 
        "auth_privatekey": "...", 
        "auth_type": "web", 
        "auth_user_name": "zeropunto", 
        "cert_sign": "..."
 }

You can save it in a secure place and replace with your new cert:

"certs": {}

and create a new one cert by zeroid. Then you can switch from the first to the second by hand, changing the file user.json. At every change please shut down zeronet.
